Description: Fragment of oval handle to moderate turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine beige; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '4..'. Name Pausanias. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX GAB 0-747?
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (208)
